summary:
[BASIC DESCRIPTION]
A simply manual downloaded mod that give you the player the option to turn you character into a God that is unkillable or a non god w/ every single perk in the game.
descriptionHtml:
[b] [BASIC DESCRIPTION][/b]
 A simply manual downloaded mod that give you the player the option to turn you character into a God that is unkillable or a non god w/ every single perk in the game.
 
[b]  [V 1.5][/b]
 Removed saves
 New description 
 More cleaner mod folder
 More detailed [Steps]
 
[b]   [V 1.0]   [/b]
 Bat files
 Saves
 Readme's                                                                 
 
 
  [b] [DESCRIPTION][/b]
 This is a revamped/cleaner version of the original version of my mod. This revamped/cleaner version gives u guys more options w/ the the mod & better [STEPS] it also visually looks better & more cleaner.
 
  [b] [God][/b]
 I tweaked all the God files making them cleaner & more organized. I also decreased the amount of levels to choose from & the amount of skill levels & the amount of gold because originally u would get so much gold u would hav a negative amount of gold.
   [NON GOD]
 I renamed the (not) to "Non god" only cause it makes more sense. The Non gods files were dramatically changed featuring more reslictic levels but not skill ;) and a fair amount of gold depending on your choice(s) of level(s) I also removed saves.
   (This is just like starting a new game just w/ preset stuff) 
 
  [b] [Future plans][/b]
 Add more options 
 Use modded presets & Races (need mod author permission)
 & proof read my description because I'm to lazy to do so now
 Add tutorial video (just to damn lazy)
author: liljkilledyou14

files.name: God or not (Bat and save files)
